name: Divine Judgment
description:
Divine judgment  is a fun role playing game about a evil wizard
on the hunt for the ultimate power! It's all up to a kid named Alex and his friends to stop him. journey through a exciting world, fighting monsters and doing bounty hunts all while getting your revenge on the man who destroyed your home.

• Multiple bounty hunt side activities!
• Fun action packed adventure!
• Multiple parts coming as a free update!

Comes with android and PC version!
